an7.29:4.1: “These seven things lead to the decline of a lay follower.
an7.29:4.3: They stop seeing the mendicants. They neglect listening to the true teaching. They don’t train in higher ethical conduct. They’re very suspicious about mendicants, whether senior, junior, or middle. They listen to the teaching with a hostile, fault-finding mind. They seek outside of the Buddhist community for teachers worthy of offerings. And they serve them first.
an7.29:4.4: These seven things lead to the decline of a lay follower.
an7.29:5.1: These seven things don’t lead to the decline of a lay follower.
an7.29:5.3: They don’t stop seeing the mendicants. They don’t neglect listening to the true teaching. They train in higher ethical conduct. They’re very confident about mendicants, whether senior, junior, or middle. They don’t listen to the teaching with a hostile, fault-finding mind. They don’t seek outside of the Buddhist community for teachers worthy of offerings. And they serve the Buddhist community first.
an7.29:5.4: These seven things don’t lead to the decline of a lay follower.”
an7.29:5.5: This is what the Buddha said.
an7.29:5.6: Then the Holy One, the Teacher, went on to say:
an7.29:6.3: and listening to the teaching of the noble ones.
an7.29:6.4: They don’t train in higher ethical conduct,
an7.29:7.3: They want to listen to the true teaching
an7.29:8.1: They seek outside the Buddhist community
an7.29:8.2: for another teacher worthy of offerings,
an7.29:9.1: These seven principles leading to decline
an7.29:9.3: A lay follower who practices them
an7.29:9.4: falls away from the true teaching.
an7.29:10.1: A lay follower doesn’t stop seeing
an7.29:10.3: and listening to the teaching of the noble ones.
an7.29:10.4: They train in higher ethical conduct,
an7.29:11.3: They want to listen to the true teaching
an7.29:12.1: They don’t seek outside the Buddhist community
an7.29:12.2: for another teacher worthy of offerings,
an7.29:13.1: These seven principles not leading to decline
an7.29:13.3: A lay follower who practices them
an7.29:13.4: doesn’t fall away from the true teaching.”
